User-facing methods

After constructing a bundle, users typically interact with it via a small number of methods. These methods are intended to be stable and documented; other methods and attributes are internal or advanced.

Analysis methods

Persistence

BundleResult.get_persistence(*, prefer_edge_weight=None, edge_weights=None, recompute=False, show=False)[source]

Cached wrapper around compute_persistence.

Parameters:

  • prefer_edge_weight (str | None)

  • edge_weights (Dict[Tuple[int, int], float] | None)

  • recompute (bool)

  • show (bool)

Max-trivial subcomplex

BundleResult.get_max_trivial_subcomplex(*, prefer_edge_weight=None, edge_weights=None, recompute=False)[source]

Cached wrapper around compute_max_trivial_subcomplex.

Return type:

MaxTrivialSubcomplex

Parameters:

  • prefer_edge_weight (str | None)

  • edge_weights (Dict[Tuple[int, int], float] | None)

  • recompute (bool)

Global trivialization

BundleResult.get_global_trivialization(*, method=None, prefer_edge_weight=None, edge_weights=None, recompute=False, orient=True, require_orientable=True)[source]

Cached wrapper around compute_global_trivialization.

Return type:

GlobalTrivializationResult

Parameters:

  • method (str | None)

  • prefer_edge_weight (str | None)

  • edge_weights (Dict[Tuple[int, int], float] | None)

  • recompute (bool)

  • orient (bool)

  • require_orientable (bool)

Derived datasets

Frame dataset

BundleResult.get_frame_dataset(*, stage='post_projection', reducer=None, max_frames=None, rng_seed=None, edges=None, subcomplex='full', persistence=None, packing='coloring')[source]

Build a frame dataset used internally by the bundle-map solver.

Parameters:

  • stage (str)

  • max_frames (int | None)

  • rng_seed (int | None)

  • edges (Iterable[Tuple[int, int]] | None)

  • subcomplex (Literal['full', 'cocycle', 'max_trivial'])

  • packing (Literal['none', 'coloring', 'coloring2'])

Bundle map (fiber coordinates)

BundleResult.get_bundle_map(*, edges=None, subcomplex='full', persistence=None, strict_semicircle=True, semicircle_tol=1e-08, reducer=None, packing='coloring', recompute=False, show_summary=False, compute_chart_disagreement=True)[source]

Cached wrapper around compute_bundle_map.

Return type:

BundleMapResult

Parameters:

  • edges (Iterable[Tuple[int, int]] | None)

  • subcomplex (Literal['full', 'cocycle', 'max_trivial'])

  • strict_semicircle (bool)

  • semicircle_tol (float)

  • packing (Literal['none', 'coloring', 'coloring2'])

  • recompute (bool)

  • show_summary (bool)

  • compute_chart_disagreement (bool)

Pullback total space

BundleResult.get_pullback_data(*, bundle_map=None, edges=None, subcomplex='full', persistence=None, strict_semicircle=True, semicircle_tol=1e-08, reducer=None, recompute_bundle_map=False, compute_chart_disagreement=True, packing='coloring2', base_weight=1.0, fiber_weight=1.0, show_summary=True)[source]

Build a pullback total space (base | fiber) with a product metric.

Return type:

PullbackTotalSpaceResult

Parameters:

  • bundle_map (BundleMapResult | None)

  • edges (Iterable[Tuple[int, int]] | None)

  • subcomplex (Literal['full', 'cocycle', 'max_trivial'])

  • strict_semicircle (bool)

  • semicircle_tol (float)

  • recompute_bundle_map (bool)

  • compute_chart_disagreement (bool)

  • packing (Literal['none', 'coloring', 'coloring2'])

  • base_weight (float)

  • fiber_weight (float)

  • show_summary (bool)
